Class Mage

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sprite
      • Moveable
        • Enemy
          • Mage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Direction

    public class Mage
extends Enemy
    This class represents a mage in the world. A mage follows the player around the map. If the player comes into contact with the mage, the level restarts. Scary.
